mapper.sql: id, did, stid, sum, remarks, date, eid, checked, paystatus, status,riqi
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from exs_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from exs_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from exs_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from exs_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by date desc

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from exs_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by date desc
mapper.insert: insert into exs_rbsm (id, did, stid, sum, remarks, date, eid, checked, paystatus, status,riqi,des ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{riqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into exs_rbsm
id,
did,
stid,
sum,
remarks,
date,
eid,
checked,
paystatus,
status,
riqi,
des,

mapper.update:
update exs_rbsm
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
riqi = #{riqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exs_rbsm set did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, riqi = #{riqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
